original_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle. Highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Add more specific details about the product

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: Provide a clearer structure for the description
Include examples of features to highlight
Suggest a format for the description
Define the desired length of the description

enhanced_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle aimed at environmentally conscious consumers. Highlight its sustainable features, such as biodegradable materials and energy-efficient production methods, along with its unique selling points, like a sleek design and customizable options. The description should be approximately 150-200 words and structured with bullet points for key features.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Clarity has been improved with more specific details

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: The flow has been reorganized for better logical progression
More relevant examples have been added to illustrate the points
Markdown formatting has been improved for better readability
The expected output format has been clarified

enhanced_prompt.highlighted_prompt: The enhanced prompt has aimed at environmentally conscious consumers that was not present in the original prompt, such as biodegradable materials and energy-efficient production methods. Additionally, several parts of the original prompt have been structured with bullet points for key features for better accuracy and refinement, including a sleek design and customizable options. Overall, the enhanced prompt provides a clearer and more structured approach to the task.
